verses.content: Jakob chu a fe ta pei a; chun, Pathien vântirkohaiin an lo intuokpui a.
Jakobin anni a hmu chun, “Hieng hi Pathien pâwlhai an nih,” a tih a; chuongchun, chu hmun hminga chun Mahanaim ân bûk a.
Chun, Jakob chun Seir rama Edom phûl tienga a u Esau kuoma chun a hmaah zuolkohai ân tlântir a.
“Ka lalpa Esau kuoma chun hieng ang hin in hril ding a nih, ‘I siehlaw Jakobin hieng ang hin a ti a nih: Laban kuoma chun mikhuol ka nih a, tu chen hin ka um ta zing a.
Bâwngchal dâm, sabengtung le berâm dâm, suoknu le suokpa dâm ka nei bawk a, i lunginsietna ka hmu theina dingin, ka lalpa hril dingin mi ka hung tir a nih,’ a tih,” tiin, thu a pêk a.
Chun, zuolkohai chu Jakob kuomah an hung kîr nâwk a, “I u Esau kuom kan va tlung a, mi za li hung ṭhuoiin a tuok ding chein a hung nghe nghe annaw,” an tih a.
Chuongchun, Jakob chu a ṭi êm êm a, a lunginzîng tah a; chun, a kuoma mi umhai dâm, berâm ruol le bâwng ruol dâm, sanghâwngseihai dâm chu pâwl hniin a siem a:
Esau chu pâwl khatah a hunga a that khawmin pâwl khat la um chu tlân hmang thei an tih ti a ngaituoh a.
Chun, Jakob bawk chun, “Aw ka pu Abraham Pathien, ka pa Isak Pathien, aw LALPA, ‘I ram tieng le i laibunghai lai fe nâwk ta rawh, chuongchun, siem ṭhâng ka ti che’ mi titu,
i siehlaw chunga lunginsietna po po în langtir le thutak po po în langtir laia a chîntak khawm hi hmu tlâk ka ni nawh; hi Jordan hi ka hmawl le bak ka kân a; tuhin chu pâwl hni zet ka lo ni ta hi.
Lunginsiettakin ka u kuta inthawk, Esau kuta inthawk ngei chu mi sanhim rawh, nunau puma a mi hung that ka ṭi sih a.
Nangin, ‘Siem ṭha ngei ngei ka ti cheh a, i thlahai chu tuisuorieta phaiphin tiem sênglo khawp raua tam angin siem ka ti che,’ i ti sih a,” a tih a.
Chun, chu zân chun chutaka chun a riek tah a; chun, a thil nei laia mi a u Esau ta dingin lâwmman dingin a sie tum a;
kêlpui za hni le kêlchal sâwm- hni, berâmpui za hni le berâmchal sâwmhni,
sanghâwngsei sâwrlai sâwm- thum an tehai leh, bâwngpui sâwmli le bâwngchal sâwm, sabengtungpui sâwmhni le sabengtungchal sâwm leh.
Chun, chuonghai chu pâwl tin a tum sengin a siehlawhai kutah ân kawltir a: chun, a siehlawhai kuoma chun, “Ka hmaah fe kai unla, pâwl tin hi kâr inneitir pei ro,” a tih a.
A hmaṭhuoitu kuoma chun hieng hin thu a pêk a, “Ka u Esau chun ân tuokpui cheh a, ‘Tu mi am i nih a? Khâwlaia fe ding am? I hmaa umhai hi tu ta am?’ tiha ân dawn pha che chun,
‘I siehlaw Jakob ta an nih, pu Esau, i ta dingin lâwmmana ân phur che a ni hi: ama khawm kan hnungah a um’ ti rawh,” tiin.
A dawttu le, a dawt nâwktu le ran ruol khaltuhai po po kuoma khawm, “Esau in hmu pha chun chuong ang tak chun in hril ding a nih.

‘Chun, ngai ta, i siehlaw Jakob chu kan hnunga sawn a um,’ ti bawk unla,” tiin thu a pêk seng a. “Lâwmman ka hmaa fe hin a lung sukdam ka ta, chu hnunga chun a hmêl hmûng ka tih; chuongchun, mi lo lâwm el a tih,” a ti a nih.
Chuongchun, lâwmman chu a hmaa chun a fe kai tah a, ama ruokchu chu zân chun a pâwl lai chun a riek tah a.
Chu zân chun a tho a, a nuhmeihai pahni le, a suoknuhai pahni le, a nau sâwm le pakhathai chu a ṭhuoi a, Jabbok vadung kaia chun a kai tah a.
Chuongchun, anni chu a ṭhuoi a, vadung chu ân kaitir a, a nei po po khawm ân kaitir bawk a.
Chun, Jakob chu ama khât bakin a um tah a; chun, mi pakhatin ama chu khawfingchat chenin a buon a buon a.
A hne nawh ti ân hrietin a êlpui ru suktuona lai hi a khîk pêk a; chuongchun, a buon lai chun Jakob êlpui ru insuktuokna chu a hung inpelsawl tah a.
Chun, mi chun, “Mîn thla rawh, khawfing khawm a chat ding a ni ta hi,” a tih a. Jakob chun, “Mal i mi sâwm naw chun inthla naw ning che,” a tih a.
Chun, mi chun a kuomah, “I hming iem a na?” a tih a. Ama chun, “Jakob,” a tih a.
Chun, mi chun, “I hming chu Jakob ti ta naw ni hai a, Israel ti lem tâng an ti che; Pathien le mihriem i thawh a, i hne ta sih a,” a tih a.
Chun, Jakobin ama chu ân dawn a, “Lunginsiettakin i hming mi hril rawh,” a tih a. Ama chun, “Iengleia ka hming indawn am i nih a?” a tih a. Chun, chutaka chun mal a sâwm tah a.
Chun, Jakobin chu hmun hminga chun Peniel ân bûk tah a, “Pathien chu a hmaihma ngeiah ka hmuha chu ka hringna hi hla a ni sih a,” tiin.
Chun, Peniel a suoksan lai tak chun nisa a hung suok a, ama chu a hung khawh a, a êlpui lei chun ân bâi tah a.
Chuleiin, tu chen hin Israel thlahai chun êlpui ru suktuoha ke tha um hi an fâk ngai nawh: Jakob êlpui ru suktuo chu a ke tha laitaka a khîk leiin.
